content:
Congratulations on your new skincare haul! Using high-end products can make a significant difference in your skin, but it's equally important to use them correctly to get the most out of them. I'd be happy to help you optimize your skincare routine.

To give you personalized advice, could you please share some more information about your skin type, concerns, and the products you've purchased? This will help me provide you with tailored guidance.

Please answer the following questions:

1. What is your skin type (normal, dry, oily, combination, acne-prone, sensitive, or mature)?
2. What are your main skin concerns (acne, hyperpigmentation, fine lines, dullness, dehydration, or something else)?
3. What products did you purchase during the Nordstrom anniversary sale? Please list the products, including the brand and product name.
4. What is your current skincare routine like? Do you have a morning and nighttime routine, or do you only skincare at night?
5. Are there any specific product categories you're unsure about (e.g., how to use a serum, how to layer products, or how to incorporate a new product into your routine)?

Once I have this information, I can offer you customized advice on how to incorporate your new products into your routine, optimize your skincare sequence, and address any specific concerns you may have.
